name: Code Riddle
description:
This is a school project made by two students.

Enters in a digital world where challenging puzzle await you. Use your hacking skills to escape this place.

There's only a tutorial and 2 levels. More was scheduled initially but we runned out of time. 

How to play ?

Here's a detailed command list:
- Z, Q, S, D (or arrow keys) to move . (Sorry this was made with french keyboard in mind)
- Spacebar to jump.
- Ctrl to crouch.
- Shift to run.
- E to interact with object.
- Left click : (when TERMINAL is unlocked)
    - to hack an object.
    - to modify/trigger a property  (with GET or GETALL function equipped).
    - to place a copied object (with COPY function equipped).
    - to destroy a copy (with DELETE function equipped)
- Right click : (when TERMINAL is unlocked) 
    - to show the target object properties (with GET or GETALL function equipped).
    - to preview the position of a copied object (with COPY function equipped).
/!\ you have to hold down the right click button !
- Scroll wheel : (when TERMINAL is unlocked).
    - to change TERMINAL function. 
    - to select a property to hack (with GET or GETALL function equipped).
    - to rotate the preview (while holding down the right click button) (with COPY function equipped).
